title: Micro-Module Design for Strengthening Statistical Data Interpretation Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Statistical Concepts (Mean, Variance, etc.) Comprehension and Basic SPSS/R Usage Skills
context.additional_context: In an interdisciplinary course combining linguistics and applied statistics, modular 15-minute learning sessions are conducted using mobile devices.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately derive t-test results from experimental data using SPSS/R.
Learners can select and generate appropriate visualization charts (heatmap/boxplot) aligned with research questions.
Learners can write reports explaining statistical significance and effect size together when interpreting analysis results.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
